member.name: T:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextDeserializer
member.summary: Represents an asynchronous deserializer that is capable of deserializing text.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextDeserializer.DeserializeAsync``1(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deserializes the given text to an object of the specified type asynchronously.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize.
member.param: The text containing the serialization data.
The cancellation token of the task.
member.returns: A task containing the deserialized object.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextDeserializer.DeserializeAsync(System.String,System.Type,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deserializes the given text to an object of the specified type asynchronously.
member.param: The type of the object to deserialize.
The text containing the serialization data.
The cancellation token of the task.
member.returns: A task containing the deserialized object.

member.name: T:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextPopulater
member.summary: Represents an object that is capable of populating objects asynchronously by reading from a text.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextPopulater.Populate(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Populates the given target asynchronously by reading from the specified text.

member.name: T:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextSerializer
member.summary: Represents an asynchronous serializer capable of serializing to a text.

member.name: M:Senkel.Serialization.Text.IAsyncTextSerializer.SerializeAsync(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Serializes the given object to a text containing the serialized data.
member.param: The cancellation token of the task.
member.returns: A task containing the text of the serialized object.
